reviews.review: Головоломка в декорациях заброшенной лаборатории в которой всем правят роботы, а вы человек, здесь за подопытную мышь.
Sex and birth at the same time, only different places. Depends on where you plant those vagina-shaped Portals...
Веселая игра, в которую можно поиграть с другом. А так же глубокий сюжет

Now this, THIS is what you call a sequal.
Portal 2.
One of the best games I have ever played.

Before I really knew what Portal was, I saw some things about the game but not much. So, during the summer sale I bought the bundle of both games and I played the first one. AMAZING. Then, I played the second one.
This is what this review is about.

Portal 2:
A game full of puzzles. With a full co-op mode and story mode, there is a lot to do.
But the puzzles... they are not puzzles like any others...
They are like a puzzle but with that twist you can't stand.
At first I thought Portal was a game for incredibly smart people.
I then played both games and realized it was for all players!

Story:
I will be completely honest with you right now. I do play a lot of sandbox games and some story games, but this is by far the BEST STORY I HAVE EVER SEEN. Amazing.

Gameplay:
Gameplay is perfect. Nothing wrong with it. Also nothing else to say.

Extras about this game:

- Puzzles for all ages but are still very challenging for everyone
- If you get stuck on a puzzle, quit the game and refresh your mind. It will help a ton.
- no lag on the highest settings (on a laptop)
- Remember to bring the resolution up!
- PLAY PORTAL ONE FIRST, or else this will make no sense to you.

This game is one thing: A must-have for ANY GAMER!
Melhor jogo da história!
Assolutamente sì.
Меня стошнило раз 5.

Best puzzle/platform game on Steam. Seriously! This game is so good: sounds & musics, graphic, gameplay, and the funniest thing are dialogs! I'm sure that every portal 2 player has laughed minimum one time, because this game has a sarcasm that others don't have. The story is fantastic too...you can't never predict what will happen next. And what about the coop-multiplayer? Absolutely enjoyable and you will have a really great time. Thanks Valve for making this game!
Great game... 10/10. I'm in love with this game!
Lives up to the greatness of the original. Portal games make you feel like a genius. It's magic. Please play this if you haven't.
juegazo prros es arte si el portal 1 era hermoso esto es una obra maestra c:
portal 3 pls

I love absolutely everything about this game. Would recommend this to anyone who enjoys solving puzzles while being insulted at the same time. Just like the first game, I was stumped at parts but eventually got it and I loved finding the secret stuff. Worth every penny!
Hermoso juego, muy buen desarrollo, buena historia y un buen final. recomendado totalmente, es dificil que llegue a salir una tercera parte, pero muy buen juego
One of the best games I've played. Every gamer should play this game.

It's challenging but full of fun.
You can not only solve riddles yourself but play with your partner.
You can gain a lot of fun.
And it is also very cheap.
What are you guys waiting for？
Super fabuła, piękna grafika, śmieszna gra Polecam 10/10

Portal 2 - это ни на что не похожий проект, очень крутой и затягивает. 12 дохлых турелей из 10.
ps:спустя больше года, мнение не поменялось.

==========================================================================
I N T R O
==========================================================================

Good morning. You have been in suspension for -FIFTY- days. In compliance with state and federal regulations, all testing candidates in the Aperture Science Extended Relaxation Center must be revived periodically for a mandatory physical and mental wellness exercise.

==========================================================================
R A T I N G
==========================================================================

---{Graphics}--- : The atmosphere really makes you feel like a lab rat. A great improvement compared to Portal, with more varied environments. And for good measure! Decent graphics that make you enjoy the storyline even better! 9/10

---{Gameplay}--- : Fun gameplay, fairly easy at the beginning and quickly becomes nightmarishly complicated. The co-op gameplay is also tricky to grasp but adds hours of fun! Be sure to analyse the environment to avoid spending hours locked in the same test chamber. 10/10

---{Audio}--- : Very good soundtrack that gives a dark atmosphere to the game. Sounds are well crafted, don't forget to put it in 5.1 (or at least stereo) to help you during the game. GlaDOS's song at the credit is my personal favourite. And Wheatley definitely brings a good dose of humour in this crazy game! 9/10

---{PC Requirements}--- : Although the levels do not require high-end graphics, it is much more enjoyable to play such a game on a fast PC to really get into the game. If you want to play without high end graphics, a decent PC should do the trick. 9/10

---{Difficulty}--- : Very fun and easy to grasp at the start. But beware: as you advance in the came, the levels become exceedingly difficult. Don't overestimate potatOS. Beware, keep your friends close but your enemies closer. 10/10

---{Grind}--- : The game takes many hours to master and understand the dynamic. Can make you start over several times to achieve your goal. Patience is your friend. The cake is a lie. The companion cube your best friend. PotatOS is not food. 8/10

---{Game Time}--- : Will last you around 10ish hours for sure to complete the game. Can take you longer if you have a tough time figuring out how to escape from certain test chambers. Some levels might take you 5 hours to figure out : one advice is sleep on it, next morning you'll get it over in less than 30 seconds. If you want a new dose of challenge, give in to the co-op game! 8/10

---{Bugs}--- : A couple of minor glitches but very few bugs to speak of. 9/10

---{Overall}--- : A classic, epic puzzle game with a FPS style, an intriguing story and complex gameplay that will require you to master guns, skills and environment. A necessity. A must have. For those that completed Portal, Portal 2 is a sweet sweet throwback into Aperture Science complex with new types of challenges that are totally dope! A game to be cherished! 9/10

☐ A decapitation or ♥♥♥♥ is more fun

==========================================================================
O P I N I O N
==========================================================================

As for Portal, Portal 2 has a simple goal mixed with an intense script, mind twisting puzzles and spooky environment. A must have and must play. Remember that if you are stuck on a level for more than 3 hours, a good night sleep will help you figure out the trick to get you out of Wheatley's insane grip! Don't forget to keep potato GlaDOS alive ! And remember: this game is meant to fuck with your brain. One of the best games to feel like your intellect has to work overtime. A must have!

Portal 2 is an amazing sequal to the game that innovated how we thinked with portals.
The story is well told apart from some areas that confuse players that have never played Portal completely but these areas are fill in later into the game.
The puzzles in the game are absolute gold although [spoiler] some behind the scenes area, especially with Wheatly [/spoiler] have an extremely confusing perspective, especially for first time experiences.
Overall, the game is completely mouth dropping and I would definitely recommend it.

Jogo treina muito o raciocinio e além disso é muuuito divertido. A história é intrigante, a jogabilidade idem. Não é curto, não acabei a campanha e tenho 11 horas disso, se vc for jogar com um amigo seu, voce pode, no modo co-op, onde voce e seu amigo pensam juntos para poder passar da fase.
 A comunidade é extremamente ativa, você pode baixar milhares de mapas que rendem no minímo uns 20~30 minutos.
Recomendo esse jogo demais !.

Bitter Sweet playing this game. Every positive review is correct, it's a challeneging puzzle FPS with a 2nd to none, atmosphere, story and character. And is somewhat replayable, particularly with community made puzzles.

But the bitter part is the realization that this almost 7 year old gem is valve's latest AAA, story driven game. And I fear it might be the last one we'll see for a while. Or, if ever.
